articles.author: Lena H. Sun
articles.title: First U.S. case of deadlier mpox virus strain reported in California - The Washington Post
articles.description: The individual is recovering after traveling from Africa, where an outbreak that has killed hundreds is spreading.
articles.content: A California resident has been infected with the more severe type of mpox virus, the first U.S. case of a virus that has sickened thousands and killed hundreds in an outbreak in Central and Eastern A… [+224 chars]

articles.title: South Africa police blockade on illegal miners lifted - BBC.com
articles.description: A court says emergency workers must be allowed to enter a mine where hundreds are thought to be without food and water.
articles.content:
A South African court has ordered that a police blockade of a disused goldmine, in which hundreds of people are located illegally, be lifted.
Emergency services have been at the site, in Stilfontein… [+3904 chars]
